subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|傳國璽|古璽文|國璽|璽印文字|璽書|璽綬|璽節|玉璽|符璽}}

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=し'}} {{ltc-l|璽}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|璽}}.

The reading changed from an initial borrowing of {{IPAchar|/shi/|[ɕi]}} to the current reading of {{IPAchar|/ji/|[d͡ʑi]}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|じ|hhira=}}

# a [[seal]] or [[sigil]] carved into a [[jewel]]
# more specifically, such a seal belonging to the Chinese [[emperor]] of the [[w:Qin Dynasty|Qin Dynasty]] or later, or belonging to the Japanese emperor
# {{ja-l|八尺瓊曲玉||Yasakani no Magatama}}, the [[jewel]] that is one of the three [[sacred]] [[treasure]]s comprising the [[w:Imperial Regalia of Japan|Imperial Regalia of Japan]]

subSections.title: Synonyms
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|璽綬|じじゅ}}: the [[imperial]] [[seal]] and the [[braid]]ed [[cord]] attached to it
* {{ja-r|璽書|じしょ}}: a [[document]] that has been [[stamp]]ed with the [[imperial]] [[seal]]
* {{ja-r|璽符|じふ}}: the [[imperial]] [[seal]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|印璽|いんじ}}: common term for the [[emperor]]'s [[personal]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]] and the [[national]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]] used for [[state]] [[business]]
* {{ja-r|玉%璽|ぎょく%じ}}: the [[emperor]]'s [[personal]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]]
* {{ja-r|御%璽|ぎょ%じ}}: the [[emperor]]'s [[personal]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]]
* {{ja-r|御名 御璽|ぎょめい ぎょじ}}: the [[emperor]]'s [[name]] and the [[emperor]]'s [[personal]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]]
* {{ja-r|剣璽|けんじ}}: {{ja-l|草薙の剣||Kusanagi no Tsurugi}} and {{ja-l|八尺瓊勾玉||Yasakani no Magatama}}, two of the [[sacred]] [[treasure]]s comprising the [[w:Imperial Regalia of Japan|Imperial Regalia of Japan]]; alternately, all three of the [[sacred]] [[treasure]]s
* {{ja-r|剣璽 渡御|けんじ とぎょ}}: the [[ceremony]] of [[imperial]] [[succession]], where the [[w:Imperial Regalia of Japan|Imperial Regalia of Japan]] are passed from the preceding [[emperor]] to the new one
* {{ja-r|剣璽 の 案|けんじ の あん}}: the [[shelf]] on which the [[w:Imperial Regalia of Japan|Imperial Regalia of Japan]] were placed, from the [[w:Heian period|Heian period]] through the [[w:Muromachi period|Muromachi period]]
* {{ja-r|国%璽|こ%くじ}}: the [[national]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]] used for [[state]] [[business]]
* {{ja-r|国%璽 尚書|こ%くじ しょうしょ}}: the [[Lord Privy Seal]], the [[minister]] or [[official]] in the [[UK]] responsible for keeping the national seal
* {{ja-r|掌璽官|しょうじかん}}: under the [[w:Ritsuryō|Ritsuryō]] system of ancient Japan, the [[minister]] in responsible for keeping the [[imperial]] [[seal]]
* {{ja-r|神璽|しんじ}}: {{ja-l|八尺瓊勾玉||Yasakani no Magatama}}, one of the [[sacred]] [[treasure]]s comprising the [[w:Imperial Regalia of Japan|Imperial Regalia of Japan]]; alternately, all three of the [[sacred]] [[treasure]]s; the [[emperor]]'s [[personal]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]]
* {{ja-r|伝国 の 璽|でんこく の じ}}: the [[imperial]] [[seal]] belonging to the Chinese [[emperor]] of the [[w:Qin Dynasty|Qin Dynasty]] or later
* {{ja-r|宝璽|ほうじ}}: the [[emperor]]'s [[personal]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]]
* {{ja-r|霊璽|れいじ}}: an [[honorific]] term for the [[emperor]]'s [[personal]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]]; something [[worship]]ped to offer [[prayer]]s to the [[soul]] of someone who has [[pass away|passed away]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: Noun derived from the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem form}} ''shirushi'' of verb {{m|ja|印す|tr=shirusu||to stamp with a seal or sigil; to mark or brand}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|しるし}}

# the [[emperor]]'s [[personal]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]] or the [[national]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]] used for [[state]] [[business]]
# the [[mark]] made by such a [[seal]] or [[sigil]]
# {{ja-l|八尺瓊勾玉||Yasakani no Magatama}}, one of the [[sacred]] [[treasure]]s comprising the [[w:Imperial Regalia of Japan|Imperial Regalia of Japan]]
# all three of the [[sacred]] [[treasure]]s

subSections.title: Synonyms
Derived terms
Etymology 3
subSections.text: Compound of {{prefix|ja|sort=みしるし|御|tr1=mi|pos1=honorific prefix|璽|tr2=shirushi|t2=imperial mark, seal, or sigil}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|みしるし}}

# a [[mark]] or [[seal]] indicating [[imperial]] [[status]]
# a [[sacred]] item indicating [[imperial]] [[status]]
# the [[emperor]]'s [[personal]] [[seal]] or [[sigil]]

subSections.title: Synonyms
